racial_traits:
Darkvision 60 ft.

Stonecunning: +2 racial bonus on checks to notice unusual stonework; automatic check when within 10 ft.

+2 racial bonus on Appraise checks that are related to stone or metal items.

+2 racial bonus on Craft checks that are related to stone or metal.

+1 racial bonus on attack rolls against orcs and goblinoids.

+4 dodge bonus to AC against giants.

Stability: +4 bonus on ability checks to resist being bull rushed or tripped when standing on the ground.

+2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison.

+2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like effects.

Weapon Familiarity: Treat dwarven waraxe and dwarven urgrosh as martial weapons.

Dragonborn.size: Varies (usually Medium, based on original race)
racial_traits:
Retains most racial traits of base humanoid race (loses some depending on transformation).

Dragonborn Transformation: Upon becoming Dragonborn, the character loses racial traits tied to physical form (such as elven weapon proficiencies or halfling size bonuses) but retains mental traits (skill bonuses, save bonuses).

Breath Weapon: 1/day usable breath weapon (15 ft. cone or 30 ft. line depending on chosen aspect), dealing 2d8 damage (Reflex half, DC 10 + 1/2 character level + Con modifier). Damage increases as level increases.

Draconic Aspect (choose one): 
- Heart: Gain breath weapon.
- Mind: Darkvision 30 ft. (or extend existing Darkvision) and +2 bonus on saving throws against sleep/paralysis.
- Wings: At 6 HD, may glide; at 12 HD, may fly at base speed (average maneuverability).

Immunity to magic sleep effects and paralysis (like true dragons).

Dragonblood Subtype: Counts as dragonblooded for effects and prerequisites.
Dragonborn.alignment_tendencies: Strong tendency toward Lawful Good (due to devotion to Bahamut), but varies.
